title: Which famous superheroes have autism? - Quora
tags: Famous People on the Autism Spectrum

response.answer_text: To my knowledge, there are no canon ones, but I’ll let loose all of the ones that have struck me as Autistic over the years. DC: Doctor Manhattan Nite Owl The Penguin Hugo Strange Marvel: Gwenpool Doctor Doom Mr. Fantastic Professor X Worm: Tattletale Bitch Labyrinth Armsmaster Accord I may add more in time.
